title: iduvOn nI
sahitya:
iduvOn nI karuNai iraivA


anupallavi

  edu tAn pizhai enrAlum EzhaikkirangAmal atikOpam koLvAyO anbin uyar nilaiyE


caraNam    annai mukham nOkkiyE angAndu nirkkum oru ariyAda shiru paravai annai enaiyALvAi  nI munnai 
nAn shei vinaiyAl mOdittuyar paTTAlum mudalvA nI parindenran murai tannaik-kELAyO iduvO
